Confused? This page will help!

Where do I start?

To start, use the Todo List to create a list of your tasks. The form at the top of the page will assist you in adding new tasks. These tasks will be saved in your browser, so you don't have to worry about losing them when you're done browsing. Be sure to describe the task, give it a priority, and set its due date!

What's next?

Once you've added a task, you can view it in the Todo List section of the page. A color-coded priority badge, along with the due date, will be visible. If you wish to edit or delete the task, you can do so by clicking the icon.

Multiple sorting options are available: Alphabetical (by description), by Priority, and by Due Date. Try them all and use whichever is most convenient for you at a given moment!

Complete a task by clicking the on the left side of the todo. Once a task is completed, it moves to the Done Todos section of the page. You can expand your Done Todos by clicking the , and collapse it again by clicking the . To move a Done Todo back up to your Todo List, click the , located in the same spot as the checkmark. If you wish to completely delete a task, click the icon on a Done Todo (Warning: Your browser will not remember a task if you choose to delete it!). Sorting options are also available for Done Todos.

Is that it?

Prioritize isn't meant to be complicated! If you still have any questions, reach out to me at prioritize.app@gmail.com and I will try to respond as soon as I can. Thank you for using Prioritize!
